statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating ASC, customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id > 10 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating, customer_id FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT review_text, review_date, service_type FROM ServiceReviews;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT service_type, review_date, review_text FROM ServiceReviews WHERE service_type = 'Delivery';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating <= 3 AND feedback_text ILIKE '%poor%' ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT review_id, service_type, review_text, review_date FROM ServiceReviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT review_id, service_type, review_text, review_date FROM ServiceReviews WHERE review_text ILIKE '%great%' AND service_type = 'Delivery' ORDER BY review_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 2;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id <= 5;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, review_text FROM customers INNER JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM services WHERE service_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT analysis_id, feedback_id, analysis_results FROM ReviewAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_id DESC;
SELECT area_to_improve, recommended_action FROM ServiceImprovement WHERE area_to_improve LIKE '%customer%';
SELECT service_name, quality_rating FROM ServiceQuality WHERE quality_rating BETWEEN 4 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT analysis_results->>'sentiment' AS sentiment_result FROM ReviewAnalysis;
SELECT area_to_improve, recommended_action FROM ServiceImprovement WHERE recommended_action IS NOT NULL;
SELECT service_name, quality_rating FROM ServiceQuality ORDER BY quality_rating DESC, service_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT car_make, car_model, car_year FROM Cars WHERE car_year > 2015;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM ServiceProviders ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT review_text, review_rating FROM Reviews WHERE review_rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT car_make, car_model, car_year FROM Cars WHERE car_year > 2010 ORDER BY car_make ASC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM ServiceProviders ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT review_text, review_rating FROM Reviews WHERE review_rating >= 4;
